channel.title: Server help needed
channel.description:
I fixed many of the errors concerning the making of a 562 rsps (thanks AtomicInt_ for helping me with my most recent one). Now everything appears to be working but when i run the client it gets stuck at connecting to update server. I've changed the ip in the client and im sure that isn't the problem. Thank you for your time.
one last thing ( off topic) does anyone know where i csn find the recources needed in order to learn how to code a 562 rsps?
http://s1235.photobucket.com/albums/ff440/kingandy1/?action=view&current=NewPicture-3.png
http://s1235.photobucket.com/albums/ff440/kingandy1/?action=view&current=NewPicture1-2.png

item.title: Server help needed
item.dc:creator: @kingandy1 kingandy1
item.description:
@kingandy1 wrote:

i’ve tried removing bits and peices of code and seeing the effect on the server but it just doesn’t work for me. Im helpless at seeing any real change and trying to figure out where to start. By tutorials i mean’t guides that actually try to help you understand what each piece of code means and what it does for the server. Does “Java for dummies” and “Java script for dummies” have any actual value for people who are new to Java? If so does it have anything you can relate to coding a rsps?

Oh yeah and i’ve heard corruptionX isn’t a very good source to work with. Anyone know a good 562 source to start with?

Read full topic

item.title: Server help needed
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

lmao, tutorials will get you no where but confused. my advice is to simply go through java files and just read the code, try to figure out what happens if something is gone, try to figure out patterns on where brackets would be etc. you will get the hang of it quite easily. i learned how to program just by reading it all. the java tuts never helped one bit lol

As for your connection problem. Make sure nothing is running on port 43594, if nothing is running id suggest restarting your comp; if that does not work try checking if your port is closed for some reason, its happened to me before.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help needed
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Java for dummies or you can use the oracle site. There is also a java tutorial on youtube by the newboston.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help needed
item.dc:creator: @kingandy1 kingandy1
item.description:
@kingandy1 wrote:

i was think more along the lines of are there any good books or tutorials for learning java? Oh and i did run the server before the client.

Read full topic

item.title: Server help needed
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You need to run your server before you start the client.

For your last question, read up on java and then put what you’ve learned into practice on a text rpg game or something of the sort, it’s good for learning purposes.

Read full topic
